Who said this:
 
 "I carried a concealed weapon. I made the determination that if somebody was going to try to take me out, I was going to take them with me." 
 
 A) Marine sniper Carlos Hathcock
 B) NRA president Charleton Heston
 C) General Patton
 D) LA police chief Willie Williams
 E) Anti-gun Senator Fienstien
 
 
 
 
 If you said the anti-gunner "E" you are correct. Many good citizens carry a gun for the same reason, but to the Senator from California, she should be exempt from the law.
